about_the_game:
[Pixel Fantasy Skill Icon Set] is a meticulously crafted collection of skill icons in pixel art style. This set is ideal for pixel art fantasy-themed games, offering a range of versatile options.

■ Detailed skill icons with pixel art aesthetics, showcasing a high level of artistry.

■ Includes 5 different elements: Lightning, Fire, Water, Poison and Earth.

■ Perfectly fitted for creating skills and abilities for your fantasy themed characters.

With this set, you can enhance your game with visually appealing skill icons that align with the pixel art style. Whether you're creating a magical world or an epic adventure, this set provides a valuable resource for adding further artistic depth in the battle!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Skill Icons (1 sheet)】

・100 skill Icons : 32x32
